titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to repeal the environmental quality incentives program.
A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to repeal the environmental quality incentives program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to repeal the Department of Agriculture Environmental Quality Incentives Program (EQIP). (EQIP provides financial and technical assistance for agricultural producers and land owners to implement certain conservation practices.)
